title: Super Dart Trap
summaries: The Super Dart Trap is a trap found inside the Jungle Temple and, rarely, outside the Temple's door. It fires a dart when activated via wire, which costs no ammunition, but a cooldown period of (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 3.33 seconds / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 3 seconds is required between firings. The darts deal 80 / 160 / 240 damage and inflict Poisoned for 15 / 30 / 37.5 seconds to players (40 damage and 15 seconds of Poisoned to NPCs, enemies, and critters).
(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) Super Dart Traps can be rotated 90° with a hammer.
(Old-gen console and 3DS versions) Unlike Lihzahrd Bricks, breaking Super Dart Traps does not require the Picksaw.

statistics.Sell: 20 SC
